roleset.name: ineffective, wasteful of time and effort
roleset.note: INEFFICIENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, efficient-j.01. (from inefficient.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The first model of anything is always clumsy and inefficient .

example.name: both args
example.text: All of this is sufficient to explain why-1 government is inefficient at accomplishing the things it chooses to do [*-1] .
example.arg: at accomplishing the things it chooses to do
